page.title: 07THEATRE IN LUTTERWORTH
page.content: There are no professional{Theatre Groups in Lutterworth, only Amateur. There is an{Opera}group who meet on a Thursday night at seven o'clock. It has{60 members.}Its average age is 28. The other{Drama Society}is called{ {MADPACK}which has 35 members and they meet on Tuesday nights. They make their own costumes and sets. The average age is 13. Some pupils from{LUTTERWORTH HIGH {SCHOOL}have been taking part in a Theatre Production at the Leicester Haymarket Theatre. It is called 'Victorian Values'. Theatre continues to be a popular entertainment. Theatre in Lutterworth is as popular with teenagers as with the middle aged.{Musicals}are popular but Operas are not. The majority of people in Lutterworth only go to the Theatre on special occasions and as a family.
